statements.select: SELECT [PLANT_ID],[EMP_ID],[EMP_TEL_NO],[EMP_NM],[CRTIC_NO], 0 FAIL_CNT FROM [SE_TA_EMP] WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NM = #EMP_NM# AND EMP_TEL_NO = #EMP_TEL_NO# AND ISNULL(ACCESS_POSSIBLE_YN, 'APPR_N') != 'APPR_X'
statements.update: UPDATE [SE_TA_EMP] SET FAIL_CNT = ISNULL(FAIL_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NM = #EMP_NM# AND EMP_TEL_NO = #EMP_TEL_NO#
UPDATE [SE_TA_EMP] SET FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NM = #EMP_NM# AND EMP_TEL_NO = #EMP_TEL_NO#
